title: Jennifer LaMountain- Confessions--Hymns and Songs of Faith
description:
Jennifer LaMountain - Confessions: Hymns and Songs of Faith

Classic meets contemporary in these brilliant arrangements of hymns and new selections. Hear the richness of a huge orchestra, the swell of brass, and the warm, friendly vocal renditions.

1 -	Come Thou Fount
2 -	Before The Throne of God Above
3 -	A Mighty Fortress
4 -	God Leads Us Along
5 -	My Confession
6 -	My Lord's Prayer
7 -	If I Had My Way
8 -	I'm Forever Grateful Medley
9 -	All Creatures
10 -	A Newborn Feeling
11 -	How Big Is God - How Great Thou Art

Thousands worldwide have witnessed the grace and passion of Jennifer's ministry. Her dynamic presence and exceptional musical talent are the tools she uses to help others experience the abundant life Christ offers to them.

This former Tennessee girl who regularly sang specials for church with her two older sisters found herself exploring music and the stage early in life.  From her first church solo at age three, to her roles in opera, to regular appearances on religious television and worldwide satellite programming, Jennifer continues to inspire listeners.

The best place to experience Jennifer LaMountainÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s extraordinary vocal gift is live on the concert stage.  It has been said you can see straight through to her soul as the melodies and lyrics flow from her lips.   The listener is drawn to the source of JenniferÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s dynamic passion Ã¢â‚¬â€œ the very heart of Jesus.

And now, with her fifth project, "Confessions".  Jennifer takes her music to a new level of beauty filled with spiritual depth.  Imagine the swell of 72 strings, a fanfare of brass, a spanish guitar, the warmth of a piano, the simplicity of a solo violin all wrapped within the timeless messages of hymns and songs from days gone by.  Words of praise, hope, healing, restoration and above all...more about Him, His love, His greatness, His strength and His redemptive power. This is the project.  This is the sound.  This is the message.
